overview: Follow 4 families raising children diagnosed with Bipolar Disorder - a single mother whose son Chase has been hospitalized 6 times; a grandmother raising 4 kids diagnosed with Bipolar Disorder, a little girl, Samantha, who was diagnosed at age 3, and Kelsey, a courageous pre-teen who heroically manages her moods, even as she faces the intensifying social pressures in school.
title: Raising Bipolar
